description: Provides details about how an DataSync transfer location for Microsoft Azure Blob Storage is configured.

parameters.name: LocationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of your Azure Blob Storage transfer location.

nested_items.name: LocationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of your Azure Blob Storage transfer location.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URL of the Azure Blob Storage container involved in your transfer.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationType
nested_items.description: The authentication method DataSync uses to access your Azure Blob Storage. DataSync can access blob storage using a shared access signature (SAS).

nested_items.name: BlobType
nested_items.description: The type of blob that you want your objects or files to be when transferring them into Azure Blob Storage. Currently, DataSync only supports moving data into Azure Blob Storage as block blobs. For more information on blob types, see the Azure Blob Storage documentation.

nested_items.name: AccessTier
nested_items.description: The access tier that you want your objects or files transferred into. This only applies when using the location as a transfer destination. For more information, see Access tiers.

nested_items.name: AgentArns
nested_items.description: The ARNs of the DataSync agents that can connect with your Azure Blob Storage container.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that your Azure Blob Storage transfer location was created.
